turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two grande Verona coffees with cream and sugar from the Starbucks on Pine Street in downtown Rochester.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you a rewards member?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I am a rewards member.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Could you please give my your 16 digit

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the number is 4140 3256 9785 1624

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, I will update your card for future rewards.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mke sure my coffees come with two additional packets of sugar on the side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will ensure you are served two additional packets of sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will also like to add two cake pops to my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What flavor of cake pops would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two chocolate chip flavored cake pops.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else for today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add a oatmeal raisin cookie too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Woud you like the cookie to be warmed for a few seconds?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: May I confirm your order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please confirm my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is two grande Verona coffees with cream and sugar with two extra sugars on the side. Two chocolate chip cake pops and one oatmeal raisin cookie warmed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready in 10 minutes at the Starbucks on Pine street in downtown Rochester.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total for today will be $11.25.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I make the payment at the restaurant?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your credit card will be charged before you pick up your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You will receive a text message on your registered phone number for the amount charged to your credit card.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you for your business, your order will be ready for pick up in 10 minutes.
